title: Leading financial centers worldwide 2019
yAxis: Points on the Global Financial Centres Index
summary: This is a bar chart representing State in the x axis and Points on the Global Financial Centres Index in the y axis.
The Points on the Global Financial Centres Index is highest at State New York and lowest at State Montreal.
The highest State New York has 74.0 more Points on the Global Financial Centres Index than the lowest State Montreal.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Points on the Global Financial Centres Index for 20 number of States.
The maximum Points on the Global Financial Centres Index 790.0 is found at State New York and the minimum is found at Montreal where State is 716.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing State in the x axis and Points on the Global Financial Centres Index in the y axis.
The Points on the Global Financial Centres Index is highest at State New York and lowest at State Montreal.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing State in the x axis and Points on the Global Financial Centres Index in the y axis.
The Points on the Global Financial Centres Index is appeared to be the highest at State New York and lowest at State Montreal.
Second maximum Points on the Global Financial Centres Index is found at State London.
The difference of Points on the Global Financial Centres Index between the highest and lowest State is 74.0.
Points on the Global Financial Centres Index at State New York is 790.0 , second place is London at 773.0, and thirdly is Hong Kong at 771.0.
State Paris, and Boston have the same Points on the Global Financial Centres Index.
The State New York tends to be 1.06 percent higher than average.
